DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo Spanish Starter Face Painting Palettes (6 Colors)
DescriptionData.Description:
Snazaroo Spanish Starter Face Painting Palettes are perfect for face painting at parties and plays. Includes 2 ml face paints in following colors: White (000), Bright Red (55) , Black (111), Bright Yellow (222), Sky Blue (355) and Lime Green (433). Also includes a brush, a sponge applicator and insert in Spanish.
The Snazaroo Starter Kit includes Snazaroo Face Paint which applies smoothly, can be easily blended and will dry in about 30 seconds to a streak-free, durable finish. Snazaroo Face Paints are hypoallergenic and the worlds safest face paints, meeting US FDA, Canadian, and European standards for cosmetic safety and the only face paint with a Child Toy Safety Rating.
Snazaroo paint is non-toxic and easy to use face paint that is water-based, fragrance-free and wash off easily. Snazaroo Face Paint gives brightly colored, totally opaque coverage.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 6 color Snazaroo Starter kit will easily paint 30 full faces or hundreds of cheek designs
Includes 2 ml face paints in following colors: White, Bright Red, Black, Bright Yellow, Sky Blue and Lime Green along with a brush and a sponge applicator.
One of the most popular face paints in the world
